title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: ELPSA-Based Creative Problem-Solving for Enhancing Mathematics Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners enhance their conceptual application skills by solving at least one open-ended mathematics problem daily according to the ELPSA instructional design framework
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in mathematical communication skills through collaborative problem-solving activities in VR simulation environments

Learners document the problem-solving process of a 1-week software development project in three stages (problem definition, solution method, result analysis) in a portfolio, create a 3-minute presentation, and achieve over 70 points (out of 100) on a peer evaluation rubric (structure 20%, clarity 30%, creativity 20%, self-reflection 30%).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
